reci.title: CHERRY AMARETTO DONUT
reci.description: Bright pink with a cherry amaretto glaze. This sweet treat is sure to please with a dollop of butter cream on top. 160$
ingredientLines: 4 baby chickens (poussins) or cornish hens (about 1 1/4 pounds each), or 4 chicken breast halves
1 tablespoon crushed red-pepper flakes, or to taste

reci.title: COCONUT TART
reci.description: Glazed with a coat of apricot jelly and finished with a cherry, these circular tarts are stuffed with a moist, rich coconut filling that is a mix of chewy and crisp. 140$
ingredientLines: 2 or 3 links of chineses sausage, cut into 1/4 inch slices
Finely chopped green onion or cilantro

reci.title: MEXICAN MILK CREAM
reci.description: Sweet bun baked with a milk cream filling and enveloped in a coffee flavored bun. 120$
ingredientLines: 40 chicken wing pieces, or 20 whole chicken wings
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
1/3 to 1/2 cup chopped fresh cilantro leaves
1/4 cup light or regular sour cream
Juice 1/2 lemon (or why not try lime?)

reci.title: VANILLA BUTTERCREAM
reci.description: A plump sweet bun, sliced open and filled with sweet cream, sprinkled with coconut flakes and topped with dried cranberries. 180$
ingredientLines: 1.0 tbsp vinegar (you can use cider, malt or wine)

reci.title: CATERPILLAR
reci.description: Called the caterpillar for its long shape with soft ridges, this bun is filled with whipped cream, dusted with confectioner's sugar. 90$
ingredientLines: 6 to 8 fresh long rice cake sticks, or 20 smaller rice cake sticks
3 to 4 tablespoons light soy sauce, depending on saltiness

reci.title: HOKKAIDO CUPCAKE
reci.description: Japanese inspired cupcakes so soft and pillowy you'll want to cuddle with it. Lightly sweetened and garnished with sliced almonds and dusted with confectioner's sugar. 210$
ingredientLines: 1 box (about 18 oz.) yellow or white cake mix

reci.title: PANDAN CUPCAKE
reci.description: To be served warm, when they're nice and chewy, with jam or with strawberries and cream. When cooled and left unadorned, they become crisp and buttery sugar cookies. 150$
ingredientLines: 2 1/2 cups self-rising white lily or cake flour

reci.title: CHOCOLATE HOKKAIDO CUPCAKE
reci.description: This  soft and pillowly Japanese cupcake is filled with a dallop of Chocolate buttercream. 140$
ingredientLines: 1 tbsp butter for creamed chanterelle mushroom sauce
Salt and freshly ground black pepp

reci.title: MAPLE BACON DONUT
reci.description: A perfect blend of sweet maple syrup and and savory bacon. This flavor combination is sure to satisfy all your taste buds. 130$
ingredientLines: 1 cup cream or half and half

reci.title: PEANUT DONUT
reci.description: Peanut butter and chocolate come together to form this sweet and crunchy donut. 190$
